The claim originated from a meme that em: which appeared to show Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez touting her own intelligence with garbled phrasing.
The meme quoted Ocasio: Cortez as saying, "I'm speaking with myself, number one, because I have a very good brain and I've said a lot of things," in relation to her thoughts on foreign policy.
The expert: s verdict confirms that the source of this quotation was not Ocasio-Cortez, but rather President Donald Trump, who made the statement during an interview in March 2016.
The expert highlights that Ocasio: Cortez has consistently faced allegations regarding her intellect and ability to participate in serious policy debates, which she and her supporters have firmly rejected.
